installCommand: yarn global add vercel@latest && yarn && yarn testCi && yarn prisma generate
buildCommand: cd ../.. && npx turbo run build --filter=web... && vercel alias --token=${{ process.env.VERCEL_CLI_TOKEN }} ${{ process.env.VERCEL_BRANCH_URL }} staging.jprojects.dev --scope=james-walkers-projects-ad1e6386
